moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Steel Wing
moves.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Autotomize
moves.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.
